body: @carlos-a-crespo this task is for you, keep [these principles](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions
@carlos-a-crespo Budget here is **30 mins** (keep [this principle](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) in mind)

@carlos-a-crespo you're working with this ticket for the last 11 days. If it's not closed within the next 48 hours, it will be re-assigned to someone else, see [No Obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle

@carlos-a-crespo it takes too long. Usually, we expect any task to be finished in less than a week. I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle
@hildo This task is yours, please go ahead keeping in mind [this](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html). If any questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@hildo Task's budget is **30 mins** (see [this](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/17/how-xdsd-is-different.html) for explanation)

@hildo the ticket is with you for 12 days already. If it's not finished in the next 24 hours, it will be re-assigned to someone else, see [No Obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

body: @hildo this task is taking too long, I have to change the performer, sorry. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.xdsd.org/2014/04/13/no-obligations-principle.html) principle
